name: SIMULACRA: Pipe Dreams
description: A spin-off of the critically acclaimed SIMULACRA, Pipe Dreams tells a brand new story, with a new interface, live-action cast and horrors to unravel. Follow the story of Teddy as he tries desperately to break free from the hold of a cursed video game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Dual Core Processor or newer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT, AMD Radeon HD 2400, Intel HD or any OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card released from 2012 onwards DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
